uk.ac.cam.darknet.database

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.darknet.database.DatabaseManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrimaryDatabaseManager, SecondaryDatabaseManager

    public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Any implementation of this abstract class has methods to search for individuals. Both the data collection manager and effects should use implementations of this class to search for individuals.
    Author:
    Ibtehaj Nadeem

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseManager(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,AttributeCategories> globalAttributeTable)
      Creates a new DatabaseManager with the specified global attribute table and sets up the connection to the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseManager

        public DatabaseManager(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,AttributeCategories> globalAttributeTable)
                throws ConfigFileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new DatabaseManager with the specified global attribute table and sets up the connection to the database.
        Parameters:
        globalAttributeTable - The global table of attributes currently supported by the system. These attributes are used to generate the table names in the database and have to be consistent between successive executions of the system.
        Throws:
        ConfigFileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getByShow

        public java.util.List<Individual> getByShow(java.util.Date eventDate,
                                   int eventVenue)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return a list of individuals that attend a particular show (combination of date and venue).
        Parameters:
        eventDate - The date and time of the show of which all individuals are to be fetched.
        eventVenue - The venue ID of the show.
        Returns:
        A list of individuals, each of which has booked a ticket for the given show.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getSuitableIndividuals

        public java.util.List<Individual> getSuitableIndividuals(IndividualRequirements requirements)
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                         RequestNotSatisfiableException,
                                                         UnknownAttributeException,
                                                         InvalidAttributeTypeException,
                                                         InvalidReliabilityException
        Returns a list of suitable individuals for an effect. The list will be sorted roughly by the overall suitability, from most suitable to least suitable.
        Parameters:
        requirements - The requirements that the effect places on the individuals.
        Returns:
        A list of individuals that satisfy the given requirements, arranged in no particular order.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        RequestNotSatisfiableException
        InvalidReliabilityException
        InvalidAttributeTypeException
        UnknownAttributeException
